item.title: How do i make it so people can only do ::starter once?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

You need to make the variable save to the character file. I suggest you learn some Java before attempting this. If you are still in need of help later on, i’ll come back and write up a “mini-tut” for you and post on your thread.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make it so people can only do ::starter once?

item.title: How do i make it so people can only do ::starter once?
item.dc:creator: @hmong95 hmong95
item.description:
@hmong95 wrote:

[quote=“King Lingerz, post:2, topic:311325”]Add an int which saves to the moreinfo file, and set it so if it’s set to 1 they can’t get it, otherwise, they can.

For example:

if (hadStarter == 1) {
      sendMessage("You've already had your starter and cannot obtain another.");
} else {
       sendMessage("Welcome to Server, here is your starting kit.");
           //Do some stuff
             hadStarter = 1;
}

EXAMPLE. Do not just take this code and paste it in a random spot. Not only will you get errors, but you will learn nothing. If you don’t know where to put it then I suggest you go get some more experience then try this again.

Otherwise, good luck.[/quote][quote=“King Lingerz, post:2, topic:311325”]Add an int which saves to the moreinfo file, and set it so if it’s set to 1 they can’t get it, otherwise, they can.

For example:

if (hadStarter == 1) {
      sendMessage("You've already had your starter and cannot obtain another.");
} else {
       sendMessage("Welcome to Server, here is your starting kit.");
           //Do some stuff
             hadStarter = 1;
}

EXAMPLE. Do not just take this code and paste it in a random spot. Not only will you get errors, but you will learn nothing. If you don’t know where to put it then I suggest you go get some more experience then try this again.

Otherwise, good luck.[/quote]

if u no where to put this code tell me plz

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make it so people can only do ::starter once?
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

Add an int which saves to the moreinfo file, and set it so if it’s set to 1 they can’t get it, otherwise, they can.

For example:

if (hadStarter == 1) {
      sendMessage("You've already had your starter and cannot obtain another.");
} else {
       sendMessage("Welcome to Server, here is your starting kit.");
           //Do some stuff
             hadStarter = 1;
}

EXAMPLE. Do not just take this code and paste it in a random spot. Not only will you get errors, but you will learn nothing. If you don’t know where to put it then I suggest you go get some more experience then try this again.

Otherwise, good luck.
